result.html: Tá an fíon seo ródhaorThis wine is too expensive.
result.ponchtml: Tá an fíon seo róḋaorThis wine is too expensive.

result.html: Níl sé ródhaorIt is not too expensive.

result.html: Bhí sé ródhaorIt was too expensive.

result.eng: I like the apartment; it's not too expensive and it's quiet and comfortable.
result.ga: Is maith liom an t-árasán níl sé ródhaor agus tá sé ciúin agus compordach
